file_insights.purpose: English language translation file for BuilderOps application

patterns_discovered.description: Translation keys organized hierarchically with 'app' for metadata and 'nav' for navigation elements
patterns_discovered.benefit: Maintains clarity and prevents key collisions as application grows

patterns_discovered.description: All English translations consolidated into one en.json file
patterns_discovered.benefit: Simplifies management and maintenance for single language baseline
Consistent with JavaScript naming conventions and easy to reference in code

patterns_discovered.description: All 17 sidebar items translated with title-cased English labels
patterns_discovered.benefit: Ensures complete UI localization support for navigation layer

gotchas_discovered.description: Some labels like 'RFIs' and 'Audit Log' have mixed casing in keys but consistent title case in values
gotchas_discovered.impact: Potential confusion when mapping keys to UI elements - developers must reference the key names carefully

gotchas_discovered.description: Navigation items are singular nouns without plural variants defined
gotchas_discovered.impact: May need additional translation keys if dynamic pluralization is required elsewhere in the application

gotchas_discovered.description: File only covers app metadata and navigation - no translations for common UI elements, buttons, messages, or error states
gotchas_discovered.impact: Will require expansion as more features are internationalized; risk of inconsistent translation patterns

approach_outcome.description: Successfully created the English translation file with all required Sidebar labels
approach_outcome.completeness: All 17 navigation labels plus 2 app metadata entries translated
approach_outcome.validation: JSON structure is valid and properly formatted

recommendations.recommendation: Establish translation file organization standards before expanding to other sections (buttons, messages, forms, errors)
recommendations.rationale: Prevents inconsistencies and rework as more translations are added

recommendations.recommendation: Create additional locale files (e.g., es.json, fr.json) using this file as template
recommendations.rationale: Enables multi-language support through consistent structure

recommendations.recommendation: Document the i18n key naming conventions and namespace organization for developers
recommendations.rationale: Ensures consistent key creation as new translations are added

recommendations.recommendation: Audit the application for untranslated strings (buttons, placeholders, alerts, validation messages) and add them to the locale file
recommendations.rationale: Ensures complete internationalization coverage across all UI elements

recommendations.recommendation: Consider using i18n-ally or similar VS Code extension for translation management
recommendations.rationale: Simplifies tracking of missing translations across multiple locales
